title: WINDOWS 10 & WINDOWS 8.1: HTML input dialog does not contain camera app
body: I'm posting this under IE development although it is in my view not a browser problem but a problem of Windows 10 & Windows 8.1.

comments.body: Agreed!  Users in the field have been getting Surfaces with Windows 10 and are expecting it to work like their iOS and Android devices at home.
I'm having the same problem: using html5 input of type file but only the file-explorer opens on Windows 10 Tablet. Major Usability Problem!
